name: simple_sentence
input: Hello world! How are you today?

name: long_paragraph
input: This is a longer paragraph containing multiple sentences. It tests the system's ability to handle extended text with proper pacing and breath control. The synthesis should maintain natural flow throughout the entire passage.

name: punctuation_heavy
input: Wait... what?! Are you serious? I can't believe it! This is amazing, truly amazing. However, we must be careful; things aren't always as they seem.

name: numbers_dates
input: The meeting is scheduled for March 15th 2024 at 3:30 PM. Please call 555-123-4567 for confirmation. The total cost is $1

name: technical_terms
input: The API endpoint returns JSON responses with OAuth 2.0 authentication. Configure the SSL certificate for HTTPS connections.

name: emotional_positive
input: I'm absolutely thrilled and excited about this wonderful opportunity! This is the best news I've heard all year!

name: emotional_sad
input: I'm deeply saddened by this tragic news. My heart goes out to everyone affected by this terrible situation.

name: question_intonation
input: Are you coming to the party tonight? What time should we meet? Where exactly is the venue located?

name: fast_speech
input: This is a test of fast speech synthesis to ensure the system can handle rapid delivery while maintaining clarity.

name: slow_speech
input: This is a test of slow speech synthesis for maximum clarity and comprehension.

name: high_pitch
input: Testing higher pitch voice synthesis for variety in vocal characteristics.

name: low_pitch
input: Testing lower pitch voice synthesis for deeper vocal tone.

name: female_voice
input: This sentence is synthesized using a female voice model for gender variety.

name: male_voice
input: This sentence is synthesized using a male voice model for gender variety.

name: stream_mode_short
input: This is a short streaming test.

name: stream_mode_long
input: This is a longer streaming test that evaluates the system's ability to provide progressive audio output. The synthesis should begin playing before the entire text is processed, providing a more responsive user experience.

name: abbreviations
input: The CEO of NASA announced that the FBI and CIA will collaborate on AI research. Dr. Smith has a PhD in computer science.

name: foreign_words
input: We went to a café for some crème brûlée and enjoyed the ambiance. The naïve résumé was très bien.

name: special_characters
input: The email address is user@domain.com and the website is https://www.example.org. Use the #hashtag for social media.

name: poetry_rhythm
input: Roses are red, violets are blue, this poetry test is just for you. With rhythm and rhyme, it passes the time.

name: consistency_test_1
input: This is a consistency test to ensure identical input produces similar output.

name: consistency_test_2
input: This is a consistency test to ensure identical input produces similar output.

name: edge_case_single_char
input: A

name: edge_case_very_long
input: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.  * 100

name: performance_speed
input: This is a performance test for synthesis speed measurement.

name: performance_batch
input: Batch item number one for performance testing.

name: audio_quality_high
input: Testing high quality audio synthesis with maximum fidelity settings.

name: audio_quality_low
input: Testing low quality audio synthesis for bandwidth-constrained scenarios.

name: multilingual_spanish
input: Hola mundo! ¿Cómo estás hoy? Espero que tengas un buen día.

name: multilingual_french
input: Bonjour le monde! Comment allez-vous aujourd'hui? J'espère que vous passez une bonne journée.

name: markup_ssml
input: <speak>Hello <break time='1s'/> world! This is <emphasis level='strong'>very important</emphasis>.</speak>

name: dialog_conversation
input: Person A: 'Hello there!' Person B: 'Hi, how are you?' Person A: 'I'm doing great, thanks for asking!'

name: breathing_pauses
input: This is a longer sentence that should include natural breathing pauses, especially when reading extended passages that require proper pacing and rhythm for optimal comprehension and listening comfort.
